meanings.definition: A room or space directly under the roof of a house or other building, used for storage or living space.
meanings.sent1: The loft in our house is filled with old books and toys.
meanings.sent2: The cat climbed up to the loft to take a nap in the sun.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally locked myself in the loft while looking for decorations.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared high like a kite in the loft of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The musty smell of the loft lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: A gallery or upper level in a church or hall.
meanings.sent1: The choir sang beautifully from the loft above the congregation.
meanings.sent2: The stained glass windows illuminated the church loft.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child hid in the church loft during the service.
meanings.sent4: The echoes of prayers filled the empty church loft.
meanings.sent5: The view from the church loft was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: To propel, hit, or throw something high into the air.
meanings.sent1: He used all his strength to loft the ball over the fence.
meanings.sent2: The baseball player lofted the ball into the outfield for a home run.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally lofted her hat onto the roof while waving to her friend.
meanings.sent4: The magician lofted the bird into the sky, amazing the audience.
meanings.sent5: The kite lofted gracefully in the wind, dancing among the clouds.

meanings.definition: To store something in a loft.
meanings.sent1: We decided to loft the holiday decorations in the attic.
meanings.sent2: She lofted her winter clothes in the attic for easy access.
meanings.sent3: He lofted the old furniture in the loft to make space in the living room.
meanings.sent4: The farmer lofted the hay in the barn to keep it dry.
meanings.sent5: The family lofted their suitcases in the attic before going on vacation.

meanings.definition: To hit a ball high into the air.
meanings.sent1: The golfer lofted the ball over the water hazard onto the green.
meanings.sent2: She lofted the tennis ball over the net with precision.
meanings.sent3: He lofted the basketball into the hoop from half-court.
meanings.sent4: The soccer player lofted the ball into the penalty area for a header.
meanings.sent5: The quarterback lofted a perfect pass to the receiver in the end zone.
